channel.title: [317] Corporeal Beast Problem [Loading 525 anim/gfx]
channel.description:
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/corp.png[/img]
It seems that it doesn't completly load the model. When it performs an animation (walk/stand) the corporeal beast itself blanks out momentarily but does perform the proper animations. I am wondering how I can fix this?
This is a renamed 317 loading 525 animations and graphics.
